verses.verse: (For the choir director; on stringed instruments. A Maskil of David.) <S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> And do not <S%H5956>hide<s%> Thyself from my <S%H8467>supplication.<s%>
<S%H7181>Give<s%> <S%H7181>heed<s%> to me, and <S%H6030>answer<s%> me; I am <S%H7300>restless<s%> in my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> and am <S%H1949>surely<s%> <S%H1949>distracted,<s%>

<S%H4480>Because<s%> of the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H340>enemy,<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H6125>pressure<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> For they <S%H4131>bring<s%> <S%H4131>down<s%> <S%H205>trouble<s%> upon me, And in <S%H639>anger<s%> they <S%H7852>bear<s%> a <S%H7852>grudge<s%> <S%H7852>against<s%> me.
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is in <S%H9123>anguish<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me, And the <S%H367>terrors<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> upon me.
<S%H3374>Fear<s%> and <S%H7461>trembling<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon me; And <S%H6427>horror<s%> has <S%H3680>overwhelmed<s%> me.
And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Oh,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that I <S%H5414>had<s%> <S%H83>wings<s%> like a <S%H3123>dove!<s%> I would <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H5774>away<s%> and be at <S%H7931>rest.<s%>
<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I would <S%H5074>wander<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> away, I would <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
"I would <S%H2363>hasten<s%> to my <S%H4655>place<s%> of <S%H4655>refuge<s%> From the <S%H5584>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> [and] <S%H5591>tempest.<s%>"
<S%H1104>Confuse,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H6385>divide<s%> their <S%H3956>tongues,<s%> For I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7379>strife<s%> in the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
<S%H3119>Day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> they <S%H5437>go<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> her upon her <S%H2346>walls;<s%> And <S%H205>iniquity<s%> and <S%H5999>mischief<s%> are in her <S%H7130>midst.<s%>
<S%H1942>Destruction<s%> is in her <S%H7130>midst;<s%> <S%H8496>Oppression<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit<s%> do not <S%H4185>depart<s%> from her <S%H7339>streets.<s%>

For it is not an <S%H340>enemy<s%> who <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> me, Then I could <S%H5375>bear<s%> [it]; <S%H3808>Nor<s%> is it one who <S%H8130>hates<s%> me who has <S%H1431>exalted<s%> himself <S%H5921>against<s%> me, Then I could <S%H5641>hide<s%> myself from him.
But it is you, a <S%H582>man<s%> my <S%H6187>equal,<s%> My <S%H9017>companion<s%> and my <S%H3045>familiar<s%> <S%H3045>friend.<s%>
We <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4985>had<s%> <S%H4985>sweet<s%> <S%H5475>fellowship<s%> <S%H9191>together,<s%> <S%H1980>Walked<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H7285>throng.<s%>

Let <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H5378>come<s%> <S%H5378>deceitfully<s%> upon them; Let them <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> For <S%H7451>evil<s%> is in their <S%H4033>dwelling,<s%> in their <S%H7130>midst.<s%>
As for me, I shall <S%H7121>call<s%> upon <S%H430>God,<s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> me.
<S%H6153>Evening<s%> and <S%H1242>morning<s%> and at <S%H6672>noon,<s%> I will <S%H7878>complain<s%> and <S%H1993>murmur,<s%> And He will <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>
He will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> from the <S%H7128>battle<s%> [which is] against me, For they are <S%H7227>many<s%> [who strive] with me.

<S%H410>God<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> and <S%H6030>answer<s%> them – Even the one who <S%H3427>sits<s%> <S%H3427>enthroned<s%> from of <S%H6924>old<s%> – <S%H5542>Selah.<s%> With <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2487>change,<s%> And who do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
He has <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> against those <S%H7965>who<s%> were at <S%H7965>peace<s%> with him; He has <S%H2490>violated<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

His <S%H6310>speech<s%> was <S%H9140>smoother<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H4260>butter,<s%> But his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H7128>war;<s%> His <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H7401>softer<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> Yet they were <S%H6609>drawn<s%> <S%H6609>swords.<s%>

<S%H7993>Cast<s%> your <S%H3053>burden<s%> upon the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and He will <S%H3557>sustain<s%> you; He will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H5414>allow<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> to be <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>

But Thou, O <S%H430>God,<s%> wilt <S%H3381>bring<s%> them <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H875>pit<s%> of <S%H7845>destruction;<s%> <S%H376>Men<s%> of <S%H1818>bloodshed<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit<s%> will not <S%H2673>live<s%> out <S%H2673>half<s%> their <S%H3117>days.<s%> But I will <S%H982>trust<s%> in Thee.
